arts.ttl: Serie A Week 1: Sassuolo vs. Napoli official line-ups
arts.sum: Kevin De Bruyne makes his Serie A debut with Scott McTominay and Lorenzo Lucca, as...

The new Serie A campaign gets underway on Saturday, as the league returns following an incredible finish to last season, and Aaron Rogan has predictions for all 10 games.

Napoli begin their title defence without the injured Romelu Lukaku, who might not return in 2025. They play newly-promoted Sassuolo. Meanwhile, Milan take on Cremonese and Roma face Bologna.
